## PROM Workflow Management {#sec-prom-workflow}

### Automated Scheduling

The platform automatically schedules PROM surveys based on:

-   Surgical procedure type

-   Evidence-based follow-up intervals

-   Patient consent preferences

-   Clinical milestone events

### Patient Communication

::: callout-tip
## Patient Engagement Strategies

-   Send reminder emails 3 days before due date

-   Provide mobile-friendly survey links

-   Offer phone support for technical difficulties

-   Send thank you messages after completion
:::
